    nl_geocode with mapview

    Edwin de Jonge

    2018-09-11

    mapview.Rmd

    Example

    library(nlgeocoder)
r <- nl_geocode( c("Henri Faasdreef 312", "Leidschenveen")) 
mapview::mapview(r)
